    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCES_COUNT

        public static int INSTANCES_COUNT
        The number of instances of BitmapDownloader that will be created. Defaults to 1.

        Set that parameter before invoking the get(android.view.View, java.lang.String, java.lang.Object, android.os.Handler, com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download.DownloadInstructions.Instructions) method, because a later change has no effect.

      • IMPLEMENTATION_FQN

        public static java.lang.String IMPLEMENTATION_FQN
        The fully qualified name of the BasisBitmapDownloader instances implementation. Defaults to BitmapDownloader.

      • HIGH_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES

        public static long[] HIGH_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES
        Indicates the upper limit of memory that each cache is allowed to reach. When that limit is reached, the instance cache memory is cleaned up.

        If not set, the DEFAULT_HIGH_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES value will be used for all instances.

      • DEFAULT_HIGH_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES

        public static final long DEFAULT_HIGH_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES
        Indicates the default upper limit of memory that each cache is allowed to reach.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOW_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES

        public static long[] LOW_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES
        When the cache is being cleaned-up, it indicates the lower limit of memory that each cache is allowed to reach.

        If not set, the DEFAULT_LOW_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES value will be used for all instances.

      • DEFAULT_LOW_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES

        public static final long DEFAULT_LOW_LEVEL_MEMORY_WATER_MARK_IN_BYTES
        Indicates the default lower limit of memory that each cache is allowed to reach.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USE_REFERENCES

        public static boolean[] USE_REFERENCES
        Indicates whether the instances should let the Java garbage collector handle bitmap soft references.

      • RECYCLE_BITMAP

        public static boolean[] RECYCLE_BITMAP
        Experimental, should be set to false for the moment.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static BitmapDownloader getInstance()
        Equivalent to calling getInstance(int) with a parameter set to 0.

      • getInstance

        public static BitmapDownloader getInstance(int index)
        Gives access to a "BitmapDownloader" instance.

        If no instance had been created at the time of the call, the instances will be created on the fly, which respects the lazy loading pattern.

        You may tune the actual implementation of BitmapDownloader to use by setting beforehand the IMPLEMENTATION_FQN attribute.

        Parameters:
        index - the instance to be returned
        Returns:
        a valid bitmap downloader instance, ready to use
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - in the case the required instance is greater or equal than INSTANCES_COUNT
